byline.contributor: Maggie Downs contributed from Palm Springs, Calif.

abstract: Vows column on wedding of Sharon Zhen and Ricky Phung.
lead_paragraph: To get her attention, Ricky Phung tripped Sharon Zhen in high school, but she had already fallen for him a year before.

headline.main: A Teenage Crush Graduates to Marriage
headline.print_headline: A Teenage Crush Graduates to Marriage

snippet: To get her attention, Ricky Phung tripped Sharon Zhen in high school, but she had already fallen for him a year before.
